name: Omnissa Workspace One UEM
description: This plugin fetches Devices data from 'Devices > Devices' page on the Omnissa Workspace One UEM platform. This plugin supports Tagging and Un-tagging devices action on the Omnissa Workspace One UEM platform.

configuration.label: API Base URL
configuration.description: API Base URL of the Omnissa Workspace One UEM tenant. To get the API base URL navigate to 'Groups & Settings > All Settings > System > Advanced > API > REST API' page and copy the REST API URL. Note: Make sure to remove the '/api' prefix from the URL if present.

configuration.label: OAuth URL

choices.key: https://apac.uemauth.workspaceone.com (India, Japan, Singapore, Australia, Hong Kong)

configuration.description: OAuth URL of the Omnissa Workspace One UEM tenant.

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID for the Omnissa workspace One UEM tenant. Can be generated from 'Groups & Settings > Configurations > OAuth Client Management' page on the Omnissa Workspace One UEM platform.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret for the Omnissa workspace One UEM tenant. Can be generated from 'Groups & Settings > Configurations > OAuth Client Management' page on the Omnissa Workspace One UEM platform.

configuration.label: Pull Device Tags
configuration.description: Pull Device Tags from the Omnissa Workspace One UEM tenant.
